codeExamples.title: Tic-Tac-Toe Cell with Signal Communication
codeExamples.explanation: This demonstrates the Observer pattern through signals. The cell emits a `cell_clicked` signal when clicked, but doesn't know or care who's listening. This creates loose coupling - the cell focuses only on its own state and behavior, while other systems (like the game board) can subscribe to be notified of clicks. The cell can have multiple listeners (UI updates, sound effects, game logic) without needing to know about any of them. This makes the code more modular and easier to extend.
